name: paste-py
title: Paste.py
description: Paste your code to the paste.fosscu.org pastebin service
author: mr-sunglasses

commands.name: paste-py
commands.title: Paste.py
commands.subtitle: paste everything to paste.fosscu.org
commands.description: Create and share code snippets using the paste.fosscu.org pastebin service

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
